title: Colin Morgan - How To Monetize A Podcast
itunes:title: Colin Morgan - How To Monetize A Podcast
description:
If you want to turn your podcast hobby into a legit income, or if you’re looking to start a podcast and make money, then pay attention to what Colin Morgan and I talk about.
 
Colin Morgan is a former professional golfer turned entrepreneur. He is the host of the Daily Grind Podcast, a show dedicated to showing you how you can get out of the grind of your life and do something you are truly passionate about. 
 
Colin shows businesses how a podcast can be their greatest marketing tool.
 
In this interview, we break down actionable strategies to monetize your podcast.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/170
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  3. Join The Elite Underdog Alphas With The Free Underdog Report: https://underdogempowerment.com/report
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
